features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增 AI 笔记、AI 文档以及魔法修图中的 AI 扩图、AI 风格功能，新增学习空间应用，优化部分场景功耗体验，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
• 新增 AI 扩图功能，支持旋转扩图和自由比例扩图，让照片秒变大片。体验路径：图库 > 选择照片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 扩图。
• 新增 AI 风格功能，使能多样的创意风格，让照片重焕新生。体验路径：图库 > 选择照片 > AI 编辑 > 魔法修图 > AI 风格。
• 新增 AI 会议纪要功能，支持 AI 一键生成会议纪要；会议录制新增外语和方言识别能力，在文本笔记中新建录音即可体验。 • 新增智慧摘要和智慧排版功能，智能生成笔记摘要，快速了解笔记要点，一键排版笔记内容，提升笔记可读性。体验路径：笔记 > 新建文本笔记 > AI 笔记 > 智慧摘要/智慧排版。
• 新增辅助阅读功能，支持多文对比，快速总结多方观点，一键生成思维导图，高效输出论文框架。 • 新增辅助写作功能，支持智慧润色、扩充/缩短篇幅、风格改写、智慧排版，轻松完成内容创作。体验路径：荣耀文档 > 打开一篇文档 > 左下角“AI 文档”。
• 新增学习空间应用，专属学习桌面，家长远程守护更放心。内置 AI 学习工具和海量教育资源，教材教辅紧跟新课标，助力孩子轻松高效学习。
• 打开全局任务栏，沉浸式切换应用。应用内手势导航上滑呈现全局任务栏，方便你快速切换应用，还可拖拽应用变为悬浮窗或分屏，为你提供更高效的桌面交互。
• 分屏场景下，支持按应用进行选择截屏。
• 优化部分场景功耗体验。
• 合入安卓 2025 年 2 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/2
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this update introduces AI Notes, AI Docs and Learning Space. It also enhances Magic Retouch with AI Outpainting and AI Style. Additionally, this release reduces the power consumption in some scenarios and incorporates a security patch. Update to enjoy the new features and improvements.

• AI Outpainting allows rotation or adjustment in a free ratio, instantly turning your photos into masterpieces. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Outpainting.
• AI Style offers a variety of creative styles to give your images a new look. Try it out by going to: Gallery > Select an image > AI Edit > Magic Retouch > AI Style.

• AI Minutes allows you to generate meeting minutes with a single tap. Meeting recording now includes foreign language and dialect recognition capabilities. You can experience it by creating a new audio recording in text notes. • AI Summary can intelligently generate note summaries, and AI Format allows you to format text with a single tap. You can read the notes more easily and quickly grasp the key points. Try it out by going to: Notes > New typed notes > AI Notes > AI Summary/AI Format.

• Assisted reading supports comparison of multiple texts and quick summarization of diverse viewpoints. Furthermore, it can generate mind maps with a single tap, and efficiently produce paper frameworks. • Assisted writing now features AI text refinement, Expand/Shorten text, Change writing styles, and AI Format, making your content creation smoother. Try it out by going to: HONOR Docs > Open a document > AI Doc in the lower left corner.

• Learning Space features an exclusive home screen, allowing parents to better understand their child's learning condition remotely. Learning Space offers AI learning tools and a wide range of educational resources. It also includes textbooks and supplementary materials that align closely with the latest curriculum standards, all aimed at enabling children to learn effortlessly and efficiently.

• Global Taskbar brings you immersive switching between apps. Use gestures to swipe up within an app to display Global Taskbar for you to quickly switch between apps. You can also drag an app to view it in a floating window or enable App Extender, creating efficient home screen interaction.
• You can take screenshots of individual apps in split-screen mode.
• Reduces the power consumption in some scenarios.

• Android security patch (Feb 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/2

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Discover more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any issues during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
